__e: Now, how do I know it didn't come from Emily?
- Emily is my family and I'm gonna make damn sure that yours doesn't harm her.
Hey, I'm, uh, I'm running home for a bit, but Emily's here if you need anything, okay?
I have too many things to take care of at work.
My God, Emily, I don't know how to tell you this.
You know what, Emily, I really don't want to hear it.
Emily and I... We aren't together.
Enough! This time tomorrow, Emily and I will be married.
And Emily and I are going to look after you completely, day and night.
That's what I used to want for me and Emily.
Yeah, maybe you're right that Emily and Danny won't work out, but it won't be her fault.
Whenever you think of me, tell Emily, and she'll get the message to me.
I wonder why Emily gave it to you to give to me.
I don't know where your money is, but it seems Emily doesn't have it.
Emily, there's something I need to tell you.
Emily has told me so much about you, and it's nice to finally meet.
Emily left this for me, but I think she should have it.
Emily told me it wasn't too late.
It's also about Emily, so you really need to be asking her.
-[Bethany] Emily... you know what a bag of salami is.
